mapper.select: SELECT U.UPLOAD_NO, U.TITLE, U.CONTENT, U.CREATE_DATE, U.MODIFY_DATE, 1 AS ATTACH_CNT FROM UPLOAD U INNER JOIN ATTACH A ON U.UPLOAD_NO = A.UPLOAD_NO
mapper.insert:
SELECT UPLOAD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO UPLOAD (UPLOAD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{uploadNo}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSTIMESTAMP, SYSTIMESTAMP)
